job.title: Software Engineer, Full Stack
job.description: join a movement in which everyone can win we started a movement in which everyone can win shoppers retailers society and every person on our team to play fair trust people and reward them for doing the right thing we see and feel the impact of our work as more and more people gain financial freedom and retailers grow across the globe founded five years ago in sydney australia afterpay has over million active customers globally and more than of the worlds best retailers around the world including anthropologie revolve dsw goat finish line levis mac cosmetics rayban and many others afterpay is on a mission to power an economy in which everyone wins afterpay is completely free for customers who pay on time helping people spend responsibly without incurring interest fees or extended debt afterpay empowers customers to access the things they want and need while still allowing them to maintain financial wellness and control by splitting payments in four for both online and instore purchases afterpay is deeply committed to delivering positive outcomes for customers we are focused on supporting our community of shopperswe trust in the next generation and share a vision of a more accessible and sustainable world in which people are rewarded for doing the right thingltbrgtltbrgtthe opportunityltbrgtltbrgtthe merchant experience team works on building new and important experiences for afterpay merchants these experiences tend to associate and coordinate multiple domain areas and teams with a potential large impact on the business as a senior member of the team you will be responsible for bringing these experiences from vision to reality this is an exciting opportunity to make a direct tangible impact on our product and work on projects that are pivotal to our companys growthltbrgtltbrgtwe are much more than our job descriptions but heres where you will beginltbrgtltulgtltligt build our core systems that serve our customers merchants risk engines and core payment processingltligtltligt contribute to our largescale applications written primarily in java kotlin and pythonltligtltligt build new merchant facing frontends written with react jsltligtltligt work closely with our crossfunctional teams consisting of designers product managers and qa in an agile fastpaced environmentltligtltligt mentor team members with less experienceltligtltligt actively participate in the development and maintenance of afterpay standards for software development testing release management and reviewsltligtltligt continuously improve team processesltbrgtltligtltulgtwho are youltbrgtltbrgtlike us youll be deeply committed to delivering positive outcomes for customers and passionate about shaping the future of afterpayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt qualifications ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt years of experience working as a software engineer with significant leadership exposureltligtltligt experience with architecting and techleading fullstack projectsltligtltligt experience with backend service development and distributed systemsltligtltligt experience with reactjs or other popular modern web frameworksltligtltligt experience with cloud infrastructure and continuous integrationltligtltligt enthusiastic about solving business problems with technology and can take ownership of an endtoend solutionltligtltligt passionate about continuously learning new technologies frameworks and servicesltligtltligt possess an execution mindset and the ability to deliver with crossfunctional teams that are globally distributedltligtltligt bamsphd in computer science or a related field preferredltbrgtltligtltulgthow we reward you we have a pay for performance culture so you can expect to be rewarded for high performance we pride ourselves on fairness and offer a competitive total reward package made up of salary incentives and benefits including the opportunity to enroll in our share matching plan we have a strong focus on health and wellbeing at afterpay as we aim to support you to succeed in both your career and personal lives such as providing employees with a corporate membership to headspace we offer a wide range of insurance programs so you have the flexibility to choose what is best for you afterpay covers of the employee cost and of the cost of your dependents we value diversity and a collaborative and inclusive environment where everyone feels they belong is important to usltbrgtltbrgthow to apply we dont know what the future holds thats the exciting part we show up and make it happen if youre brave if youre committed to doing the right thing and excited by this opportunity click apply nowltbrgtltbrgtafterpay is continuing to hire for all open roles with all interviewing and onboarding done virtually due to covid all new team members in addition to current staff will temporarily work from home until it is safe to return to our offices
